meta.@content: This snowman example shows a colorful PixelTexture applied to X3D primitive shapes - happy holidays!
Craig Schwetje, Leonard Daly and Don Brutzman
X3D book, X3D graphics, X3D-Edit, http://www.x3dGraphics.com
An experimental version of X3D JSON encoding is used for this scene.  Status online at http://www.web3d.org/wiki/index.php/X3D_JSON_Encoding

-children.#comment: Add transparent geometry over the text to make clicking (i.e. Anchor selection) easier
